entries.title: Auto & Transport Roundup: Market Talk
entries.description: Find insight on Ferrari, BRP, Renault, and more in the latest Market Talks covering the Auto & Transport sector.

entries.title: Energy & Utilities Roundup: Market Talk
entries.description: Gain insight on OPEC’s decision to extend production cuts, Galp Energia, and more in the latest Market Talks covering Energy and Utilities.

entries.title: Basic Materials Roundup: Market Talk
entries.description: Find insights on American Eagle gold coins, DSM-Firmenich, the value of global miners, Press Metal Aluminium, and more in the latest Market Talks covering Basic Materials.

entries.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
entries.description: Find insights on the future of grocers, Lenovo’s deal with Alat, Telekom Malaysia, and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

entries.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
entries.description: Find insights into Gen Z voters, Canadian Western Bank , Laurentian Bank of Canada, Quilter, and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

entries.title: Keith Gill's Reddit Account Shares New Screenshot Showing No GameStop Stock Sales
entries.description: The screenshot showed 5 million shares of GameStop and 120,000 options contracts, the same amount in a screenshot shared Sunday evening.

entries.title: E*Trade Considers Kicking Meme-Stock Leader Keith Gill Off Platform
entries.description: Morgan Stanley’s trading platform discusses concerns about possible manipulation in GameStop.

entries.title: Hamas Took More Than 200 Hostages From Israel. Here's What We Know.
entries.description: Israel says 120 hostages abducted on Oct. 7 remain in captivity in Gaza, including the bodies of at least 41.

entries.title: S&P 500 Edges Higher; Energy Stocks Falter
entries.description: The S&P 500 eked out a 0.1% gain, with energy its worst-performing sector. GameStop and other meme shares surged.

entries.title: Biden to Issue Executive Order on Southern Border, Limiting Asylum
entries.description: The order, which President Biden plans to sign alongside several mayors from southern-border communities, aims to restrict the flow of migrants over the border.

entries.title: Law Firm's Bankruptcy Ouster Casts Shadow on Private-Equity Ties
entries.description: A bankruptcy judge’s ruling to disqualify law firm Vinson & Elkins over its ties to a private-equity client threatens a common legal arrangement.

entries.title: bareMinerals, Laura Mercier Owner Orveon Global Mulls M&A Options
entries.description: The beauty company behind bareMinerals and Laura Mercier is hunting for add-on deals in the skin-care and sun-care categories that have international appeal to boost its portfolio, its chief executive said Monday.

entries.title: MLB Player Faces Lifetime Ban for Betting on Baseball
entries.description: San Diego Padres infielder Tucupita Marcano is one of multiple players under investigation by the league for violating the sport’s policy on gambling.

entries.title: Canada, Border-Agent Union in Talks to Avoid Labor Disruption
entries.description: The Canadian government and negotiators for the union representing border agents started a new round of talks Monday in a bid to avoid a labor disruption that could stymie cross-border commercial-truck traffic and tourist entry.

entries.title: 'Hot Dog Money' Review: The Broker Who Broke Bad
entries.description: Caught committing fraud, he agreed to gather evidence on people who, for a bribe, connected college players with agents and advisers.

entries.title: Mexico Ruling Party's Election Sweep Spooks Markets
entries.description: The result could give the nationalist movement the power to push through constitutional changes that opponents say risk weakening Mexico’s democracy while increasing the role of the state in the economy.

entries.title: Netanyahu Signals Openness to Cease-Fire but Wants Option to Resume Fighting
entries.description: The Israeli leader showed cautious support for initiative from President Biden, but his position runs counter to demands by Hamas for a lasting cease-fire that secures the group’s survival.

entries.title: Maersk Lifts Guidance Again on Surging Freight Rates
entries.description: A.P. Møller-Mærsk raised its full-year guidance again on Monday, as disruptions in the Red Sea and strong shipping demand continue to buoy rates.

entries.title: New York's 'Congestion Pricing' Economy
entries.description: The purpose isn’t to raise revenue but to keep cars out of Manhattan. That will constrain growth.

entries.title: Trump Is a Target of Blind-Leading-the-Blind Justice
entries.description: The legal system was never purely impartial, but this case is also an assault on American democracy.
